structure.name: Attach

method.name: i_cal_attach_new_from_url

parameter.name: url
parameter.comment: The url from which the object is created

method.comment: Creates a new #ICalAttach from the url.

method.name: i_cal_attach_new_from_data

parameter.name: data
parameter.comment: The data used to create the #ICalAttach

parameter.name: free_fn
parameter.comment: The function used to free the data when the create #ICalAttach is detroyed

parameter.name: free_fn_data
parameter.comment: The userdata used for the free function @free_fn

method.comment: Creates a new #ICalAttach from the data.
method.custom:
g_return_val_if_fail (data != NULL, NULL);
return i_cal_attach_new_full (icalattach_new_from_data (data, (icalattach_free_fn_t) (free_fn), free_fn_data), NULL);

method.name: i_cal_attach_new_from_bytes

parameter.name: bytes
parameter.comment: The #GBytes holding the data used to create the #ICalAttach

method.comment: Creates a new #ICalAttach from the data in bytes. Takes a reference of @bytes, increase the reference before calling this function if you with to use it afterward. The stored bytes should be already encoded with used encoding (like base64).
method.custom:
g_return_val_if_fail (bytes != NULL, NULL);
return i_cal_attach_new_full (icalattach_new_from_data (g_bytes_get_data (bytes, NULL), unref_g_bytes, bytes), NULL);

method.name: i_cal_attach_ref

parameter.name: attach
parameter.comment: The #ICalAttach to be referenced by once

method.comment: Increases the reference counter by 1 for the @attach.

method.name: i_cal_attach_unref

parameter.name: attach
parameter.comment: The #ICalAttach to be unreferenced by once

method.comment: Decreases the reference counter by 1 for the @attach.

method.name: i_cal_attach_get_is_url

returns.comment: Whether the @attach is built from url

method.comment: Checks whether the #ICalAttach is built from url.

method.name: i_cal_attach_get_url

returns.comment: The url component of the @attach. %NULL if it is built from data or there is an error.

method.comment: Gets the url, if the #ICalAttach is built from the url.

method.name: i_cal_attach_get_data

returns.comment: The data component of the @attach. %NULL if it is built from url or there is an error.

method.comment: Gets the data, if the #ICalAttach is built from the data.
